title: current most op champ
body: {{champion:157}} once he reaches {{item:3087}} + {{item:1018}} or  {{item:3046}} + {{item:1018}}  he becomes insanely hard to deal with need 4 dedicated tanks just to keep him peeled off the adc

replies.body: His dash is pretty short range compared to a lot of ADCs, and can only be used on them once. If you knock him off after he has dashed to the adc, he can't get back outside flash.
